sentence.Network_en: At length the final conflict took place between Aeneas and Turnus.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃涅阿斯和图努斯终于展开了最后的决战.

sentence.Network_en: Aeneas challenged Turnus to decide the contest by single combat.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃涅向图努斯提出挑战,两人单独决斗比试高低决定战争的胜负.

sentence.Network_en: On the side of Aeneas were the expressed decree of destiny.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃涅阿斯显然拥有命运的宠爱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...具有动物和人类双重面目。他是希腊著名大英雄伊阿宋(jason)、阿喀琉斯(achilles)和亚尼斯(aeneas)的抚养者和导师。传说他是宙斯的父亲克洛诺斯(cronus)和斐莱拉(philyra)之子.

list.abs: ...；眼的后缘中央常有一个小型波状突起；臀圈明显，四边形或六边形，或稍为长形；足常较长。我国不及10种。伪蜻 Cordulia aenea闪蓝丽大蜻 Epophthalmia elegans

means.word_mean: 1. a mythical Greek warrior who was a leader on the Trojan side of the Trojan War; hero of the Aeneid
